name.baseName: Dust collector, electrostatic precipitator, for industrial use
除尘器，静电除尘器，工业用

dataSetInformation.common:synonyms: Particulate collector; Fume extractor; Smoke precipitator; Industrial air cleaner; Static eliminator; Environmental control device; Pollution control equipment
Particulate collector; Fume extractor; Smoke precipitator; Industrial air cleaner; Static eliminator; Environmental control device; Pollution control equipment
dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The product flow describes a dust collector known as an electrostatic precipitator, which is designed for industrial use. It outlines the type of dust collection system, noting it operates on electrostatic principles to remove particulate matter from exhaust gases. The description includes information on its processing level, technical specifications, compliance with industry standards, quality metrics, application in industrial settings, production method, and input materials used in its assembly. The product flow also indicates this dust collector is either part of a production or consumption mix and specifies the point in the supply chain where it is made available, such as 'to consumer' or 'at plant'.
产品流描述了一种用于工业用途的除尘器，称为静电除尘器。它概述了除尘系统的类型，指出它采用静电原理从排放的废气中去除颗粒物质。描述包括其加工水平、技术规格、符合行业标准、质量指标、在工业设置中的应用、生产方法和组装时使用的输入材料的信息。产品流还表明这种除尘器是生产或消费混合物的一部分，并指明了在供应链中的可用点，如'向消费者'或'在工厂'。
